message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product for an excellent price of $200. I think you'll find it's a fantastic deal!
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is too high. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $200 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $170. This is a very fair offer.
I'm still interested in the product, but $170 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $145.
